metadata.title: USN-4785-1 -- npm vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that the npm command-line interface mishandled certain sensitive information. An attacker could use this vulnerability to collect authentication information that could be used to impersonate other users.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4785-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  npm - 3.5.2-0ubuntu4.1.18.04.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
